name: shoe-store-landing-page
description: Modern landing page for shoe store with responsive design

scripts.build: npm run build:clean && npm run build:copy && npm run build:minify
scripts.build:clean: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist dist/assets/css dist/assets/js dist/assets/images
scripts.build:copy: cp -r index.html sitemap.xml robots.txt dist/ && cp -r assets/images dist/assets/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.build:minify: npm run build:minify:css && npm run build:minify:js && npm run build:optimize:images
scripts.build:optimize:images: echo 'Images copied. Manual optimization recommended for production.'
